name: Robbo (itch)
description:
Robbo has been trapped in a hostile extrasolar system. He needs to collect missing screws in order to fix a spacecraft and escape from each of 56 planets.

Control using gestures in vertical or horizontal axis:

  • short gesture - turn toward a given direction or move one step forward
  • long gesture - go forward
  • double tap - fire in current direction (ammo required)
  • holding screen (no move) for 2 seconds - restart level (suicide)

At the bottom of the screen there is a status bar with:

  • score
  • no. of screws to be collected
  • no. of lives
  • no. of keys
  • amount of ammo
  • current planet #

(This is a conversion of a retro 8-bit game to HTML5/JavaScript)
